channel.title: Training on A sea kayak story
channel.description: Recent content in Training on A sea kayak story

item.title: PEI-go-round on the Xeon Kayak Ergometer
item.description: This is not the actual trip. This is just training mapped on chart to have an idea of what the real thing might be. July 3, 2024, days of building on-water confidence, with C2TC Sea Kayak Coaching May 14, 2023, lap2 28 days on ergo, 263 nautical miles, 490 km Stats March 10, 2023, lap1 33 days on ergo, 281 nautical miles, 522 km Stats Xeon is a heavy-use Kayak Ergometer, that gives a true feel of on-the-water paddling.
